tagline: Taste the royal flavor in every sip

galaxy_coffee.description: Coffee infused with the smooth taste of Galaxy chocolate.

bounty_coffee.description: An exotic taste combining coffee and coconut.

honey_coffee.description: Coffee sweetened with natural honey for a warm flavor.
